Two careless admins generated RSA keys with a shared prime. Both encrypted the same secret as 490179935380876056603109945816644425027916860546568306916948226276929504735941223025490192767956756556950065847804309379303927989807277432903443951012375. Can you uncover the flag?

The flag format is flag{...}
n=9730020527985634058047202298609664620807213387459448663260743323977086088741634107307915623137131062458241018788515446320619718796875964221768362981689579, n2=8139752526501644381830169496183523653200720877849781037128359623495858595976305711893451008457829971188021855725898126498741648883545278556236652441777183, e=1604841661582825066484286455365597556696581512626096032263383907582889208506563735610303179825332254233190851237860578282700850566889119045809626882127609

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{bpnknc61}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: 490179935380876056603109945816644425027916860546568306916948226276929504735941223025490192767956756556950065847804309379303927989807277432903443951012375
vulnerability: shared prime
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common prime, computing GCD(n, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n=9730020527985634058047202298609664620807213387459448663260743323977086088741634107307915623137131062458241018788515446320619718796875964221768362981689579, n2=8139752526501644381830169496183523653200720877849781037128359623495858595976305711893451008457829971188021855725898126498741648883545278556236652441777183, e=1604841661582825066484286455365597556696581512626096032263383907582889208506563735610303179825332254233190851237860578282700850566889119045809626882127609
extra_info: p=104315459470718219415570786100459966471754836139804573076704544891543862478579, q=93274962094347013177992314317067793777391441481130162695161322408275428009001, q2=78030165114562971902372584515436362548221717163008210486946613060693085405477, φ(n)=9730020527985634058047202298609664620807213387459448663260743323977086088741436516886350557904537499357823491028266300042998784061104098354468543691202000, φ(n2)=8139752526501644381830169496183523653200720877849781037128359623495858595976123366268865727266512027817405959396878149945438836099981627398284415493893128
